name: Web of Unity
description: Welcome to Web of Unity, a 3D action-adventure web-slinging platformer. In this game, the evil Beetle horde and their ruler, King Beetle, have invaded your home and are threatening your family. You, Mr. Spider, must destroy King Beetle to save your loved ones and your territory. Navigate through the environment with a combination of web-slinging (left click) and WASD to take him down with a devastating melee strike (right click)! You can take down his minions as well, who drop health buffs once defeated. Or, you can avoid them altogether for a stealthier approach --  the choice in how to play is yours!
